htmlContent: Compare each player’s status on the Military Operations Tracks. If Phasing Player has more MIlitary Operations points, he scores 1 VP. If Phasing Player has more Military Operations points and has met the Required Military Operations amount, he scores 3 VP instead.
name: Arms Race
plainContent: Compare each player’s status on the Military Operations Tracks. If Phasing Player has more MIlitary Operations points, he scores 1 VP. If Phasing Player has more Military Operations points and has met the Required Military Operations amount, he scores 3 VP instead.
